archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The AIA is an organization of over 300 chapters established to serve the needs of architects at the national, state, and local levels. The collection includes programs for chapter meetings, lecture announcements, and WIA information.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the American Institute of Architects Publications must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: American Institute of Architects Publications, Ms2001-056, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The American Institute of Architects Publications were added to the IAWA Small Collections Ms2009-054 in September 2009.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The American Institute of Architects is an organization consisting of 300 chapters designed to serve the needs of architects at the national, state, and local levels. The collection consists of programs for chapter meetings, lecture announcements. The collection also includes information about lectures publication, program agendas for committees within the AIA, specifically the WIA (Women in Architecture).
